item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: vireo
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Montreal, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Who we are
item.dc:creator: vireo
item.content:encoded:
Vireo Productions Web design and content creation At Vireo, we believe in beautifying the Internet, and that top-notch writing, images, and videos are just as important to a websites success as the design itself. We believe partnering with clients is the best way to serve your needs, and that the best partnerships are open and transparent. Named for the vireo, a type of bird that summers in Saskatchewan, were proud of our prairie roots.
Ashleigh Mattern Owner and project manager Ashleigh is a writer and editor by training and experience. For seven years, she ran a freelance writing and editing business under her own name, and she continues to serve many of her long-time clients through Vireo Productions. As Vireos project manager, shes our clients main point of contact, ensuring projects are moving along smoothly, and websites are being delivered on time.
Jordan Mears Owner and designer-developer Jordan is a self-taught designer and front-end developer. He first started learning code as a kid, and has been making websites since Angelfire and Geocities were cool. As Vireos designer-developer, he helps you create the visual style for your site, then builds it from the ground up. His goal with all of his sites is to write clean code that any programmer can work with down the road.

item.title: What we do
item.dc:creator: vireo
item.content:encoded:
We design custom websites and create professional content.
At Vireo Productions, we believe in building our clients a unique space to showcase their business. Were not plugging slapdash content into a prefabricated theme -- we work hard to build you a website from scratch, and fill it with original, high-quality content. To learn more about how we do this, see our process.
To do this, we draw upon a wide variety of skills and services, provided by Vireo staff and our network of freelancers. Building a website that fits into your marketing plan often takes all of the skills listed below, but you can also contract us to help you with any service we provide, even if youre not building a website.
Design services Website design and development Logo development Infographics Print and display design
Content development Copywriting and journalism Editing Photography Videography
Marketing services Website integration Email marketing Social media management Media kits
Technical support Setting up hosting Training in website management Analytics set-up and monitoring Ongoing website maintenance

item.excerpt:encoded: A review of how your online presence can do a lot more than identify ways to improve your website. It can also reveal underlying organisational issues.

item.title: Contact us
item.dc:creator: vireo
item.content:encoded: [contact-form-7 id="112" title="Contact form 1"]

item.title: Platinum Paint and Body
item.dc:creator: vireo
item.content:encoded: Vireo's number one goal with the Platinum site was to make the contact info easy to find. As an SGI-accredited shop, people need to get a hold of Platinum fast with their auto claims. One of the challenges building the site was that Platinum has no consistent logo or marketing materials. We chose colours that pop, and will be easy for the shop to replicate if they want to use them elsewhere, and clean fonts that mimic the clean paint jobs they do for their clients.
item.excerpt:encoded: Platinum Paint and Body owners Alan and Manderschied have owned Platinum since 1996, and had yet to build a site for the shop. Al loves everything to do with cars, and has little interest in tasks like building a website, so he contacted Vireo Productions to help Platinum get with the times, and get online.

item.title: Global Exteriors
item.dc:creator: vireo
item.content:encoded: When Vireo Productions first met with Global Exteriors, they already had a website: Owner Andy Fehr had built it himself almost 10 years ago, and while the old site did provide contact info, some basic information about their products, and a gallery, they needed a modern update. Vireo completely re-imagined Global's website, building a new site from the ground up, while using the colours, fonts, and styles Global already uses in their marketing materials.
item.excerpt:encoded: Global Exteriors has been specializing in residential exteriors for over 20 years. In the past, owners Andy and Brian Fehr had built the business's website on their own, but with the business growing, their time was limited and they knew Global Exteriors needed a site more professional than they could produce.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The whole Global team was integral in helping their new site come to life. Vireo met with Global several times throughout the process, and we took into account their suggestions and requests, leading to a design that is just as much Global's as it is Vireo's. The final site provides the same information on their old site -- and so much more. The new site provides a detailed product list, three themed galleries, and a section to help do-it-yourselfers, in addition to everything the old site provided.

item.title: Advanced Auto Care and Tire
item.dc:creator: vireo
item.content:encoded: Vireo Productions wanted the Advanced Auto Care and Tire site to be clean and bright, with all of the information easy to access. We chose to create a one-page site featuring original photos Vireo took behind the scenes at the shop. The result is an intuitive splash page with photos that pop. Using the building's prominent golden yellow sign as inspiration for the colouring, the site reflects the branding Advanced already uses while ensuring the site feels modern and fresh.
item.excerpt:encoded: Advanced Auto Care and Tire is an offshoot of Alan and Cindy Manderschied's Platinum Paint and Body. While they own both businesses, they wanted each company to have its own personality and visual style, so although we worked with the same team, we approached the Advanced site like a whole new project.

item.title: Welcome to the Vireo Productions website
item.dc:creator: Asheigh
item.content:encoded:
Every business needs a website, no matter what industry. A company with a website is saying it takes its work seriously, it has made an investment into its image, and it wants to connect with its customers. As a web design and development company, it was especially important that the Vireo Productions website not only tell our story and allow you to connect with us, but also stand as an example of what we can do. Our goal was to keep the website simple, and the communication clear. Hence our straightforward tagline: We make websites. With Vireo Productions, that little phrase encompasses a lot of skills and expertise, including filling those sites with professional content. We developed our logo alongside our website, allowing us to easily choose complimentary colours and fonts. Choosing the right fonts is always a challenge, and Vireos designer-developer, Jordan Mears, has high standards when it comes to fonts. Were proud of our decision to use Avenir, a sans-serif inspired by Futura. People come to websites for three main reasons:
  1. To find contact information.
  2. To learn more about a business.
  3. To shop or research prices.
Our contact info is on every page of our site, and weve included the expected Contact page. Weve created an About pagethat tells you about Vireo, its services, and its owners; and weve included a Portfolioso you can see our work. We have not posted our prices because each project can vary so widely. Instead, weve created a page that describes our processto give you an idea of what its like to work with us. With the launch of our website, Vireo Productions is officially open for business! If youre looking for a fresh, new website, give us a ring. If youre based in Saskatoon, Sask., like we are, well stop by in person for a chat. If youre from further afield, were happy to arrange a talk via Skype.

item.title: How do I build a website?
item.dc:creator: Asheigh
item.content:encoded:
How do I build a website? Its a question weve all asked ourselves at some point in time, even the best developers -- although they may have only been kids when they first asked that question. Developers have spent years learning specialized languages that allow them to build a website from almost nothing. Its magical to see a website transform from a simple line of text that reads, Hello, world! into a responsive, animated, multi-dimensional work of art. But you dont have to learn code to make a website. Today, there are many different ways to build a website for yourself, no coding experience required. All it takes is bit of time, effort, and cash.

Step 1: Get a domain name

If youre building a website for your business, you want to put a professional face forward, which includes buying a customized domain name. Its simply unprofessional for your businesss website to be at yourbusiness.wordpress.com. At Vireo Productions, we like A Small Orange. Their customer service is unbelievably great, and their prices are reasonable. Cost: About $15/year

Step 2: Set up hosting

Now that you have a name, you need somewhere to host the data. The words and pictures that make up your site cost digital space. A Small Orange also does hosting, or you can use services like Squarespace, Wix, or Weebly, which allow you to build a website from a theme and register a domain name and hosting, all under one subscription. A Small Orange cost: About $35-$240/year Squarespace/Weebly/Wix cost: About $96-$300/year

Step 3: Design your site

If you like designing and writing and sourcing photographs, this is the fun part. If you dont like doing those things, this is the part where you bang your head against a wall. Services like WordPress, Squarespace, Wix, and Weebly offer you prefabricated themes where you drop in the content you want to display. Between choosing a theme that reflects your business, to writing content, to finding photos, this step can be very time consuming. Squarespace/Wix/Weebly cost: Included in subscription WordPress cost: About $25-$200

Or hire a professional

If this all sounds like too much for you, it might be better to hire a developer like Vireo Productions. Were experts in publishing websites -- we do this kind of work all day, every day. Why hire a professional web designer?
  1. You wont have to settle. When choosing a pre-made theme, youll have to settle for one that most closely matches your businesss style. If you work with us, well be able to create exactly what you need.
  2. Youll get better content. At Vireo Productions, we work with our clients to produce high-quality writing, photographs, and videography for every project.
  3. We take care of details. We know about the little things you might not think of, like building in multiple resolutions of the same image, so it looks good on different sizes of screens.
  4. Clear pricing. With subscriptions, there are multiple levels of pricing, with confusing add-ons and considerations like bandwidth. How do you know which one is right for you? At Vireo, we explain all of our pricing, and ensure youre only paying for what you need.
  5. Your time is money. Youre paying us to put in the time so you dont have to.
  6. We take it to the next level. While the sites you can build with services like Squarespace or WordPress are passable, we can make your businesss website truly stand out.
If youre looking for a fresh, new website, give us a ring. If youre based in Saskatoon, Sask., like we are, well stop by in person for a chat. If youre from further afield, were happy to arrange a talk via Skype.
